CustomField.description: [DO NOT DELETE] - This field is used to pull the grant contact names for email templates
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Grantee_Contact_1__c <>"",Grantee_Contact_2__c <>"") , Grantee_Contact_1__r.FirstName & "," &" and " & Grantee_Contact_2__r.FirstName & "," , IF( Grantee_Contact_1__c <>"",Grantee_Contact_1__r.FirstName & ",", Grantee_Contact_2__r.FirstName & ",") )
CustomField.label: Grantee Contact
